entry.tran: （尤指吸引人或令人兴奋的）混合物,大杂烩
entry.def: A melange of things is a mixture of them, especially when this is attractive or exciting.

example.ex: ...a successful melange of music styles, from soul and rhythm and blues to rap.
example.tran: 从灵乐、节奏布鲁斯到说唱等各种音乐风格的成功组合
